ud5.3:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrels’ feeding ground.
ud5.3:1.3: At that time in Rājagaha there was a leper called Suppabuddha.
ud5.3:1.4: He was poor, destitute, and pitiful.
ud5.3:1.5: Now, at that time the Buddha was teaching Dhamma, surrounded by a large assembly.
